query_natural: Zones are areas with spatial 3D volumes, and include, Buildings, Storeys, and Spaces.
Zones may contain other zones, Buildings may contain storeys, Storeys may contain spaces.
Zones may intersect, or be adjacent to other zones.
There are building elements, which may have sub elements.
Zones may have elements, either contained, adjacent, or intersecting it.
A adjacent zones and/or elements share some interface.
Zones and Elements have a 3D Model (including geometry, material, etc.).
A device performs one or more functions
A building space is a geographical point characterized by acertain altitude, latitude and longitude
A device shall have a model property
A building space defines the physical spaces of the building where a device is located, such as a kitchen or a living room
The devices can belong to several categories
A switch is a device that has category Actuator
A function represents the functionality necessary toaccomplish the task for which a device is designed
